label: AB3C6_hP20_182_c_af_i-001
title: CoNb$_{3}$S$_{6}$ Structure
comments:
In many cases the (2c) site is not completely occupied. 
 See the discussion about the possible difference in structure between \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C6_hP20_173_b_a2b_2c-001}{natural} and synthetic edgarite, FeNb$_{3}$S$_{6}$. 
 The ICSD uses FeNb$_{3}$S$_{6}$ as the prototype for both structures.  Here we use CoNb$_{3}$S$_{6}$ to distinguish between the two cases.
